name: Heart of England Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My wife and I stayed here to break up an after-work journey down to London from Manchester and I've got to say for the price this has got to be one of the best value deals we've ever found.
reviews.title: A friendly alternative to Travellodge

description: The Heart of England is a converted 18th Century Farmhouse which now operates as a Pub/ Restaurant and 13 bedroom hotel. The rooms have been fully refurbished to a high standard under the Marston’s Inns brand in Spring 2008 and offer guests free wi-fi, luxurious bedding, flatscreen digital TVs and tea and coffee making facilities. We offer all our guests a complimentary breakfast from our continental buffet and range of cooked option.The hotel is ideally located just a couple of miles from the M1 and 6 miles from Northampton. It also offers easy access to Milton Keynes and Coventry, being situated between the two and can easily reach the A5, A45 and M40.
